comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content:
One of the former Project EXTRAVERSION YP-80As, serial 44-83028. Along with serial 44-83029, both birds had been deployed to Italy in the closing months of the war for operational testing - NO COMBAT.

Another excellent example of historical documentation through art: Pisanos was flying 029 cross-country when, low on fuel, bad weather (seen above) forced him to jettison his tiptanks and make a landing on a rural road next to an alfalfa field. Undamaged, the ship was refueled and flown off the road by CAPT Russ Schleeh without incident...
